properties.description: updating dimensional work order tables in edw_mart
Process the ABN data in Databricks delta then move to Azure sql db

activities.name: usp_get_tablelist_by_sourceid
activities.description: Lookup activity to retrieve the list blob csv file need to be processed from the metadata table.

activities.name: ForEachABNFiles
activities.description: looping through the list of blob file.

activities.name: getlistofblobfile
activities.description: Lookup activity to retrieve the list blob csv file need to be processed from the metadata table.

properties.description: Transfer file to Archive folder in global scape

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select  

     FileFolderName 
	 ,SourceFileName
    ,ArchiveFileFolderName =FileFolderName  + '\Archive\' + convert(varchar(20),dbo.udf_getLocalDTM(),112) 
	
from etl.sourcesystem s
LEFT OUTER JOIN ETL.SourceTableDetails d
ON s.sourceid = d.sourceid 
and d.isactive = 1
where sourcename = '@{pipeline().parameters.sourcename}'

activities.name: ForEachTable
activities.description: ForEach activity to get the partition list from Lookup activity and then iterate each of them to Copy activity.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select  FileFolderName,SourceFileName,TargetBlobFilePath,TargetBlobFileName = lower(TargetBlobFileName + '_' + convert(varchar(20),dbo.udf_getLocalDTM(),112) + targetBlobFileNameExt )
from etl.sourcesystem s
LEFT OUTER JOIN ETL.SourceTableDetails d
ON s.sourceid = d.sourceid 
and d.isactive = 1
where sourcename = '@{pipeline().parameters.sourcename}'

activities.description: ForEach activity to get the partition list from Lookup activity and then iterate each of them to Copy activity.

properties.description: Copy new or updated rows only from database using external control table

ifFalseActivities.name: FullCopyToBlob
ifFalseActivities.description: Full Copy from source table into blob storage

ifFalseActivities.name: SqlServerStoredProcedure2
ifFalseActivities.description: Stored procedure activity to store the new high-watermark value into external control table for delta data loading.

ifTrueActivities.name: lkp_getpreviousdatevalue
ifTrueActivities.description: Retrieve  the last high-watermark value stored in external control table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select isnull(@{pipeline().parameters.Control_Table_Column_Name},'1753-01-01') as WatermarkValue from @{pipeline().parameters.Control_Table_Table_Name}
where TableID = @{pipeline().parameters.TableID}

ifTrueActivities.name: lkp_getcurrentmaxvalue
ifTrueActivities.description: Retrieve  the current maximum value in watermark column of source data store

ifTrueActivities.name: DeltaCopyfromDB
ifTrueActivities.description: Copy activity to use query to filter the delta data by > last high-watermark and <= current high-watermark from source database, and then only copy the changes to the destination store.

ifTrueActivities.name: SqlServerStoredProcedure1
ifTrueActivities.description: Stored procedure activity to store the new high-watermark value into external control table for delta data loading.

Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn.defaultValue: CASE WHEN LAST_MOD_DATE <> '' AND LAST_MOD_TIME<>'' THEN (CAST(LAST_MOD_DATE AS DATETIME) + CAST(stuff(stuff(LAST_MOD_TIME ,3,0,':'),6,0,':') AS DATETIME)) END
